column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/382561Perkasa unaware of Umno-CPC tie-upAlyaa Alhadjri     17 May 2017Malay rights pressure group Perkasa leader Ibrahim Ali was unaware that Umno had signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with the Communist Party of China (CPC)."Maybe I overlooked (the MOU). Nobody alerted me... But does it involve any training programme? Not as far as I know."If there was (any training programme), all I can say, that's the end of Umno lah," Ibrahim told a press conference today.For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
Hahahaha..katak bodo. Resign laa..let new fresh leader take over
"If there was (any training programme), all I can say, that's the end of Umno lah," Ibrahim told a press conference today.MCA... a friend, that no one wants... inb4 UMNO = Communist
so now that u know how?
Malaysia dah jadi negara komunis di bawah naungan maharaja cina xi jinping. Chin peng gagal but umno sukses.
